assessment_item.subject: Botany
assessment_item.title: LCMMQK-Q4-ஆக்சனோமீட்டர் பயன்படுவது
assessment_item.body:
{"data":{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

ஆக்சனோமீட்டர் பயன்படுவது               

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

ஒளிச்சேர்க்கை செயல்பாடு அறிய         

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1608"},{"text":"

சுவாசித்தலை அறிய

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1609"},{"text":"

வளர்ச்சி செயல்பாடுகள் அறிய     

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:1619"},{"text":"

நீராவி போக்கு செயல்பாடுகள் அறிய

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1624"}],"questionCount":0,"media":[]},"config":{"metadata":{"max_score":1,"isShuffleOption":true,"isPartialScore":true,"templateType":"Horizontal","name":"LCMMQK-Q4-ஆக்சனோமீட்டர் பயன்படுவது","title":"LCMMQK-Q4-ஆக்சனோமீட்டர் பயன்படுவது","board":"State (Tamil Nadu)","medium":"Tamil","gradeLevel":["Class 11"],"subject":"Botany","qlevel":"MEDIUM","category":"MCQ"},"max_time":0,"max_score":1,"partial_scoring":true,"layout":"Horizontal","isShuffleOption":true,"questionCount":1},"media":[]}}
